text:
Romeo: Oi, what’s up there?
It’ s Juliet!
Eyes brighter than an iPhone’ s flash!
Face more tender than a KFC zinger burger!
How I wish I were a makeup brush to that face!
Juliet: Far out.

connections.prompt: Does Juliet really love Romeo, or is she trying to win him over for some other purpose?
Will Juliet speak out loud, or will Romeo speak first?
Does Juliet love Romeo as much as he does her? What does she have to say?
